column1: Little Goat Diner////We've now been to Little Goat numerous times
column2: and each time our minds are blown by the excellent service
column3: unique menu options and most importantly
column5: flavorful and creative food. Every single item we've tried was delicious. Even when there's been a wait
column6: we've loved checking out Little Goat bread
column7: sipping on their awesome specialty lattes and sampling a little bread. Our favorite items are...
